availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse Greathouse (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and grist miller.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah Garrison Greathouse in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1861. Father of Mary Greathouse, Lucinda Greathouse, and Phebe Greathouse. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Elk Spring District, p. 148A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Warren County, KY, February 1864, p. 121.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339890.
